verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H8055>joy<s%> in thy <S%H5797>strength,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and in thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> shall he <S%H1523>rejoice!<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> him his <S%H3820>heart's<s%> <S%H8378>desire,<s%> and hast <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H4513>withheld<s%> the <S%H782>request<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H6923>preventest<s%> him with the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of <S%H2896>goodness:<s%> thou <S%H7896>settest<s%> a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of pure <S%H6337>gold<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>
He <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> thee, and thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> it him, even <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
His <S%H3519>glory<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in thy <S%H3444>salvation:<s%> <S%H1935>honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%> hast thou <S%H7737>laid<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him.

For <S%H3588><s%> thou hast <S%H7896>made<s%> him most <S%H1293>blessed<s%> <S%H5703>forever:<s%> thou hast made him exceeding <S%H2302>glad<s%> <S%H8057><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thy <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and through the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> of the most <S%H5945>High<s%> he shall <S%H1077>not<s%> be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
Thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies:<s%> thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall find <S%H4672>out<s%> those that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee.

Thou shalt <S%H7896>make<s%> them as a <S%H784>fiery<s%> <S%H8574>oven<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of thine <S%H6440>anger:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall swallow them <S%H1104>up<s%> in his <S%H639>wrath,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> them.
Their <S%H6529>fruit<s%> shalt thou <S%H6>destroy<s%> from the <S%H4480>earth,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and their <S%H2233>seed<s%> from among the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H5186>intended<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee: they <S%H2803>imagined<s%> a mischievous <S%H4209>device,<s%> which they are <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H3201>able<s%> to perform.

Therefore <S%H3588><s%> shalt thou <S%H7896>make<s%> them turn their <S%H7926>back,<s%> when thou shalt make <S%H3559>ready<s%> thine arrows upon thy <S%H4340>strings<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of them.
Be thou <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in thine own <S%H5797>strength:<s%> so will we <S%H7891>sing<s%> and <S%H2167>praise<s%> thy <S%H1369>power.<s%>
